Heart: A History bụ akwụkwọ 2018 nke Sandeep Jauhar dere
N'akwụkwọ Jauhar na-atụle nnwale na usoro akụkọ ihe mere eme n'oge gara aga yana otu a ga-esi ewere ihe ọhụrụ dị egwu.

oké egwu nnabata
Mmeghachi omume dị mma maka akwụkwọ ahụ, ma nata nyocha site na The New Statesman, The Globe and Mail, na Financial Express. The Washington Post na Business Standard dere nyocha dị mma, ebe nke mbụ na-ekwu na ọ bụ "agụmakwụkwọ na'adọrọ mmasị maka ndị anyị na ya na ndị na - na
